content:
@indigoxela Random question, but how do you pronounce your username?

Is it 'Indigo-zella' or 'Indigo-ex-ella' or something else?
In my head I was pronouncing it indigo-shela. I think because in Guatemala there's a city called Xela-ju by the locals and it's pronounced that way (I was there years ago)
But an X can be pronounced many different ways I bet
Hehe, that "xela" is just alex the other way round, so you would pronounce it like that. Something like "ksela".
Mystery solved :sweat_smile:
